TopicTitle: Any Kerbal models for Source Film Maker?

Articles.Content:
I'm pretty sure this has been asked already, but the thread has been lost to the forum disaster I apparently missed in my absence, so I never saw the results.

Has anyone yet ported models from Kerbal Space Program to the Source Engine to allow for greater versatility in community videos? If so, could I be directed to them? If not, would someone be so kind as to do that?
Bumping this thread, it needs an answer.
I wonder if the guy who made the Kerbin Art sticky thread can distribute his Kerbal model.

I wonder if the guy who made the Kerbin Art sticky thread can distribute his Kerbal model.

Would be nice.

Would be nice.

You mean... THIS MODEL!?

DUN DUN DUNNNNNN
Oh my help me! That is crazy looking.

You mean... THIS MODEL!?

Had your post actually held any additional information it would've likely been seen as beneficial and thus not resulted in a necrolock, however as you decided to revive a 5 month year old thread just to post a teaser picture necrolock it is.

Thread closed.
